sentences.en: A geyser is an intermittently eruptive hot spring.
sentences.cn: 天然热喷泉就是间歇性的喷发的热泉水.

sentences.en: At last, they hid it in a small, inactive geyser.
sentences.cn: 最后, 他们把头发藏在了一眼小小的 、 活跃的间歇泉里.

sentences.en: But, unlike any other geyser, this one erupted with a poisonous gas.
sentences.cn: 但是, 这个间歇泉不像其它间歇泉, 它喷发的时候毒气也一起冲起来.

sentences.en: Currently, repleneshing the Geyser's Vespene Gas supply is a somewhat futile effort.
sentences.cn: 目前, 回复气矿变得有些没多大作用.

sentences.en: Old Faithful geyser is the most famous.
sentences.cn: 老实间歇泉是最著名的.

sentences.en: Pressing the space bar will center your screen on the collapsed geyser.
sentences.cn: 这时按下空格键,屏幕画面会切换到已经耗尽的气矿上.

sentences.en: Recent research suggests the clockwork geyser eruptions are slowing down anddueglobal warming - related dry spells.
sentences.cn: 最近的研究建议发条间歇泉喷发是减缓,甚至可能停止,因为全球变暖有关的干旱期.
蒸气从热水锅炉里冒出.

sentences.en: The butler was almost invisible in the stream of an antiquated geyser.
sentences.cn: 在这座古老的热水锅炉产生的水蒸汽中隐隐约约可以看到那个男仆的影子.

sentences.en: The gas pushed out of geyser and lifted the hair all across the land of Tierra.
sentences.cn: 气体从间歇泉一冲而上,头发也随之飘散在空中,散落在蒂尔拉的大地上.

sentences.en: The scientists were surprised to find an abundance of marine life near the geyser vents.
sentences.cn: 科学家们对间歇泉口附近的丰富的海洋生物感到奇怪.

sentences.en: The tourists marveled at the geyser , which spurted water to a height of ten meters.
sentences.cn: 间歇泉喷出数十米高的水柱, 这景观让游客很惊讶.

sentences.en: There we saw American bison, elk, mountains, hot springs, and the Old Faithful geyser.
sentences.cn: 在那儿我们看过北美野牛, 麋, 山, 温泉, 和“老忠实”喷泉.

trans.tran_cn: 间歇喷泉，（厨房、洗澡间的）煤气热水器[炉]
trans.tran_en: a natural spring that sends hot water and steam suddenly into the air from a hole in the ground
